page.title: 11SELLING UNWANTED GOODS
page.content: When people want to sell things from home they often put small notices in shop windows, usually{newsagents.}Here are some we found in one window:- {EXERCISE CYCLE}fold-up with adjustable saddle, speedometer and pedal tensioner. Â£20.{AMSTRAD COMPUTER}with V.D.U.,joystick and games. Â£300 o.n.o. {FORD FIESTA XR2 }black, A registration stereo equipment, sunroof and tinted glass, any inspection welcome, immaculate throughout, Â£4,495.{WILTON {CARPET}all wool, burgundy colour, size 3 x 3 yards, as new, guaranteed top quality, including underfelt. Â£15. {BARBECUE}brand new, on legs, including all tools. Â£2.50.{SMALL BELLING {ELECTRIC COOKER }good condition, in working order. Â£8. (o.n.o. means "or near offer".)
